```{r spa, include=TRUE}

library(leaflet)

    addTiles() %>%

    addMarkers(lat= 50.4922, lng=5.867, popup= "Czar Peter the Great used to drink water here") %>%
    addMarkers(lat= 50.492, lng=5.8644, popup= "The old bath house") %>%
    addMarkers(lat= 50.4942, lng=5.8644, popup= "The new bath house")


my_map
```
